lead_paragraph: Two closely watched measures of the manufacturing sector in China declined in June in the latest sign that Beijing's efforts to scale back stimulus have begun to moderate the nation's growth.
snippet: Two closely watched measures of the manufacturing sector in China declined in June in the latest sign that Beijing's efforts to scale back stimulus have begun to moderate the nation's growth.

headline.main: New Data Shows China’s Growth Is Slowing
headline.print_headline: New Data on Manufacturing Shows China’s Growth Is Slowing
